topic.title: Vaerospace General Discussion
topic.body: Need to know about what gives at Vaerospace .. ask away

topic.title: The Sun and Moon ARE Highly Populated
topic.body:
How far can you see into the abyss ?

Many think the world is in the grips of the Illuminati Satanist bankster ... Nothing could be further from
the actuall reality.
My research ,many many hours with a telescope and online has pointed to the earth being flat and Time Travel being a reality , imagine if you will a time continuum "parcelled" off into Real Estate with timelords who own these epochs or chunks of the continuum , fanciful you say ? Take a good look at your reality , it's a B horror movie . and getting worse by the second , are our local timelord masters having fun and kinky entertainment at our expense ?

I postulate that our domain we call earth was probably a construct (maybe virtual) built to culture and protect and has been captured and enslaved...

topic.title: Zeronet Coin and Exchange Currency Scheme For Zeronet ...
topic.body:
Seriously , no exchanges , no native coin scheme , looks like Im gonna be a busy puppy...

As everyone on zeronet will be able at access the record data , my gut says that"exchange signing" may be an answer and units are exchanged and signed by old and new owners in the deal ...and the resulting hash is then propagated , old void hashes are deleted after a set period say 2 weeks if there are no challenges to the exchange .. 

There could be of course many different schema's and I have not pondered on this for long would be keen to hear other proposals for a zeronet currency ...

I sort of thinking out loud here , but my take id that ALL CRYPTO'S are used in exchanges kinda like "atomic swaps" and a base exchange mechanism using DOGECOIN or BYTECOIN would instantly monetise the zeronet coin which is essentially and exchange instrument

topic.title: Are the any videos on site building
topic.body:
I've just read a lot about what zeronet cant do ... but there is so much zeronet can do , I would love to watch some video's on using the api or make them but I find the level of programming is niched and therefore unless you're a python weenie and love coffee script you're going to battle...

The reason zeronet is languishing is the lack of development , for instance I cant unmute somebody in zerome even tho the unmute exits in the api...

Zeronet did what IPFS could'nt and make content dynamic , RSA keys make currency possible and metamask is obviously a "rush" issue (please get on with it)

I am used to reading source and back engineering , begging for help on forums and such , so here I go again , please ...If you're a coder who has a reasonable grasp of the wrapper and UI functions and can help with the basics ie fonts DB and the like please..

I also fail to see why html 5 frames dont work IE embedding real youtuve videolinks and frames ect

I do not know if these sites exist on zeronet yet but it's obvious that they need to

    html 5 "flash " gaming ... ie poker and interactive games
    amazon style sales
    a facebook clone / instagram
    content link imbedding from the http https net
    private databases and admin dashboards for sites/ owners

Before you go red in face and blow your stack , I've been on zeronet for 4 days and Im getting bored and want to develop and help AND I DO NOT KNOW EVERYTHING and may be far off track here ....

please be nice
post on reddit : https://www.reddit.com/r/zeronet/new/

topic.title: Guess the Chink Govt is Pooping itself about Zeronet
topic.body:
The trolls are all over this zeronet thing , I'm crying with laughter

Im coming across very obvious shilling and trolling of the kind that would have been cutesy in 2011 but in 2018 it's just plain funny , and my 1600 twitter followers 2000+ youtube followers 700+ minds.com followers and 900+ steemit followers will all soundly agree !!! 

It seems that the strategy is just to infest zeronet with shill agents and kill it , sorry NOT going to work

topic.title: Just cloned Zerome - posting on TweetMe
topic.body:
A little more generic for new zeronet users , has merged database 
TweetMe here:
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1AnCJoWSBHwrVFfpHM9oJP8n2WmKptscNy/

1534537059_1Kh3qLdTH2QKewUb6cWZa2dMveMT5.body: If anyone knows how to "sticky" this post be much abliged TA !! In advance :)

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): Hi, try to open ZeroHello and into "Search in connected sites" field paste:sticky zerotalk clone site:zerotalk

I meant stick this post not the whole site :)

> [ssdifnskdjfnsdjk](#comment_1_1L4dZcDF2maSKHDy788yhxpYnBWnXadUtS): Hi, try to open ZeroHello and into "Search in connected sites" field paste:sticky zerotalk clone site:zerotalk [...]

Bit nervous about increasing data for posts atm , but got that sliding bit , have no idea what to do about "sticky zerotalk clone site:zerotalk" no idea what it will do ?

> [vaerospace](#comment_3_1Kh3qLdTH2QKewUb6cWZa2dMveMT5EcVer): Bit nervous about increasing data for posts atm , but got that sliding bit , have no idea what to do about "sticky zerotalk clone site:zerotalk" no idea what it will do ?

ok trieD that and got an answer many TNX you a SUPERSTAR !!!!

> [vaerospace](#comment_3_1Kh3qLdTH2QKewUb6cWZa2dMveMT5EcVer): Bit nervous about increasing data for posts atm , but got that sliding bit , have no idea what to do about "sticky zerotalk clone site:zerotalk" no idea what it will do ?

mine says 200K may take a while to update in browser cashe ect

I do not think you are serious about populated moon, did you seen NASA detailed photos of the moon? Or you have any solid proof it is populated under surface? I kind of think the answer lies in the fact that gaseous states and liquid states are Ionicly different and that the combination of h and 0 leads to a more dense and less ionic state that occupies less space and is far more dense hence comparing gas volume to liquid volume is nonsensical - interesting anyway ..test folder sharing NO test reedit contentent .json remove sticky retest after publish and sign SITE WORKING was a bad sticky link in content.json causing the issue
